title.jp: ママは私に白樺の樹皮のズボンを縫った

subTitle.en: We have suspended BCH trading and are currently airdropping the new BSV coin to BCH holders.
subTitle.ru: We have suspended BCH trading and are currently airdropping the new BSV coin to BCH holders.
subTitle.jp: ママは私に白樺の樹皮のズボンを縫った

title.jp: ママは私に白樺の樹皮のズボンを縫った

subTitle.en: Done! We have distributed new BSV coins to all BCH holders. These coins can now be traded, as well as deposited and withdrawn.
subTitle.ru: Done! We have distributed new BSV coins to all BCH holders. These coins can now be traded, as well as deposited and withdrawn.
